column1: '''Progress in Bimble Town''' is a poem by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] first published on [[15 October]] [[1931]] within the ''Oxford Magazine'' Vol. 50 No. 1 on page 22.
In [[1987]], the poem was reprinted in ''[[Tolkien and the Spirit of the Age
column2: Tolkien and the Spirit of the Age: Papers as Presented at the First Lustrum Celebration of the Dutch Tolkien Society Unquendor]]''.
